prompt: Create the 31st malayalam lesson and edit the vegan culinary one to be still about plant based cuisine but not mention vegan at all or plant-based anywhere.

data.prompt: Create the 31st malayalam lesson and edit the vegan culinary one to be still about plant based cuisine but not mention vegan at all or plant-based anywhere.

data.content:
I need to create a plan to address both requirements: creating the 31st Malayalam lesson and modifying an existing one. I will use the `plan_task` tool for this.

The plan will involve:
1. Listing Malayalam lessons to identify the "vegan culinary" lesson and the last lesson number.
2. Reading the "vegan culinary" lesson to understand its content.
3. Modifying the "vegan culinary" lesson to remove "vegan" and "plant-based" terms.
4. Writing the updated "culinary" lesson back to the file and validating it.
5. Designing content for the new 31st lesson, focusing on a relevant topic like "Shopping for Groceries".
6. Creating the 31st lesson file and validating it.
7. Updating the `_unit_metadata.json` for the unit.

parameters.goal: Create the 31st Malayalam lesson and modify the existing 'vegan culinary' lesson.

steps.description: List Malayalam lessons in unit_1_foundations to identify the 'vegan culinary' lesson and the highest lesson number.
Read the content of the identified 'vegan culinary' lesson (28_culinary_lab.json).
Modify the 'vegan culinary' lesson content to remove all mentions of 'vegan' and 'plant-based' while retaining the culinary theme.
Write the modified content back to 28_culinary_lab.json and validate it.
Design the content for the 31st Malayalam lesson (e.g., 'Shopping for Groceries'), ensuring it follows all lesson format specifications.
Write the 31st Malayalam lesson JSON file (e.g., 31_shopping_groceries.json) and validate it.
Update the _unit_metadata.json for ml/unit_1_foundations to include the new lesson and increment lesson_count.

plan.goal: Create the 31st Malayalam lesson and modify the existing 'vegan culinary' lesson.

steps.description: List Malayalam lessons in unit_1_foundations to identify the 'vegan culinary' lesson and the highest lesson number.
Read the content of the identified 'vegan culinary' lesson (28_culinary_lab.json).
Modify the 'vegan culinary' lesson content to remove all mentions of 'vegan' and 'plant-based' while retaining the culinary theme.
Write the modified content back to 28_culinary_lab.json and validate it.
Design the content for the 31st Malayalam lesson (e.g., 'Shopping for Groceries'), ensuring it follows all lesson format specifications.
Write the 31st Malayalam lesson JSON file (e.g., 31_shopping_groceries.json) and validate it.
Update the _unit_metadata.json for ml/unit_1_foundations to include the new lesson and increment lesson_count.

result.message: Plan created with 7 steps. Use mark_step_complete to update progress.
